title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official 
Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal 
Origin) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 244 of 2021), the European Union 
(Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of NonAnimal Origin) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 638 of 2021), 
the European Union (Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports 
of Food of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2022) (S.I. 
No. 328 of 2022), the European Union (Official Controls in relation to Food 
Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) Regulations 
2023 (S.I. No. 50 of 2023), European Union (Official Controls in relation to 
Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 51 of 2024), European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 310 of 2024), the Regulations 
of 2024 and these Regulations may be cited together as the European Union 
(Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of NonAnimal Origin) Regulations 2020 to 2025.

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Principal Regulations” means the European Union (Official Controls in relation 
to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 575 of 2020); 

“Regulations of 2024” means the European Union (Official Controls in relation 
to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) 
(No. 3) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 549 of 2024).

text_raw:

of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting for the definition of— 

(a) 

“Annex I to EU Regulation 2019/1793” the following:

2025/90048, 21.1.2025).

Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/286 of 16 
January 20248 and Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2024/3153 of 18 December 20241;”.

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 4. The Principal Regulations are amended by inserting for Regulation 24
text_raw:
4. The Principal Regulations are amended by inserting for Regulation 24 

the following: 

“Transitional provision
text_norm: 4 principal regulation amended inserting regulation 24 following transitional provision

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: 24. Notwithstanding the provisions of Regulation 20(4), until 8 March 2025
text_raw:
24. Notwithstanding the provisions of Regulation 20(4), until 8 March 2025 
an operator is not guilty of an offence where he or she imports into the State 
from a third country, without complying with the requirement in Regulation 
8(1)(m)(ii)(II) or (IV), a consignment of cumin seeds from Türkiye, dispatched 
before 8 January 2025, from the country of origin or from another third country 
if that country is different from the country of origin.”. 

2 OJ No. L 277, 29.10.2019, p. 89. 
3 OJ No. L 144, 7.5.2020, p. 13. 
4 OJ No. L 129, 15.4.2021, p. 119. 
5 OJ No. L 387, 3.11.2021, p. 78. 
6 OJ No. L 158, 13.6.2022, p. 1. 
7 OJ No. L 25, 27.1.2023, p. 36. 
8 OJ L, 2024/286, 17.1.2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [38] 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 February, 2025. 

JENNIFER CARROLL MACNEILL, 

Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [38] 5

title: powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give further effect to Commission Implementing Regulation 
(EU) 2024/3153 of 18 December 2024 amending Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2019/1793 on the temporary increase of official controls and emergency 
measures governing the entry into the Union of certain goods from certain third 
countries implementing Regulations (EU) 2017/625 and (EC) No. 178/2002 of 
the European Parliament and of the Council. 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Official Controls in relation to 
Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 575 of 2020) by replacing the definitions for Annex I and II of EU 
Regulation 2019/1793 to capture the Annexes to Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2024/3153 and to allow, for a transitional period, the 
importation of cumin seeds which do not meet the requirements of Regulation 
8(1)(m)(ii)(II) or (IV) of the Principal Regulations, from Türkiye into the State. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Official Controls in 
relation to Food Legislation) (Imports of Food of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [38]
